oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Greene, Capt. Polk - Letter
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greene, Colton; Civil War; military; correspondence;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Capt. J. W. Polk, Cotton Office, Monroe, LA, to Colton Greene, Homer, LA: requests soldiers and arms to protect shipments of cotton while they are being loaded onto steamers for export.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
